snippet.title: The Guest Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The Guest is a first person exploration game where you'll try to escape an oppressive psychological space. Solve riddles and work through complex puzzles in order to discover the identity of you captors and their motives. 505 Games and Team Gotham, invite you to check in at http://store.steampowered.com/app/402040

http://theguestgame.com/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/theguestgame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheGuestGame/ 

For behind the scenes details on all of 505's games, head to the official 505 Games Blog: http://www.505games.com/blog
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/505Games
Twitter: https://twitter.com/505_Games
